text:
A2A is a company,
is a multi-utility company.

We are using some services
that are, let me say,
We want to give to our execs

not only the dashboard,
but also the possibility

to put some questions
in the natural language,

because A2A is a company
with five business units

and every business unit
is different.

We want to be in this kind of
direction, helping

to understand what is happening
in their business.

We are a company
that the sovereignty is for sure

is quite important
and this is the reason why
